name: WebEx Advanced Recording File
summary: Learn about .ARF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ARF recordings can be converted to Windows Media (.WMV) or Flash (.SWF) files using the free WebEx ARF Player.
NOTE: ARF files are WebEx recordings downloaded by the user, while .WRF files are WebEx sessions recorded directly by the user.

description: An ARF (Advanced Recording File) file is a Network-Based Recording (NBR) file created from an online meeting conducted via WebEx. It contains higher quality video and audio, and is the widely used file format in WebEx meetings. Information contained in an ARF file includes video data, table of contents, attendee list, desktop recording, application sharing, and other meeting content. ARF files can not be directed edited, but start and end of playback can be truncated. ARF is the default file format used by WebEx meetings.

An ARF file contains a recording of an online meeting downloaded from WebEx. It is recorded using Network-Based Recording (NBR) and stores the video data, a table of contents, an attendee list, and other information on separate panels.
